name: Qwanz
tag_list: opinion-polls, surveys, market-research, petitions, activism, citizen-2-0, participative-democracy, consumer-activist
overview:
Qwanz enables users to be heard, by leveraging their opinions through polls or surveys and sending results to elected officials, government agencies, the press or corporations, because “One voice may not be heard but thousands together cannot be ignoredâ„¢”.

Qwanz is the “go-to” site when users want to validate their ideas, gain support for their cause or simply get peopleâ€™s opinions on any topic ranging from politics to sports.

By embedding a poll or survey widget, bloggers and site owners can quickly aggregate votes on the same poll embedded across the web, thereby generating large meaningful opinion poll results, on any subject, that can then be sent directly to politicians, government agencies, corporations or 20,000 journalists worlwide.

While content is user generated and can cover any topic, Qwanz provides a neutral platform where users get non biased feedback.
